questions.question: She ………………………….. cooked dinner.
questions.description: We use emphatic pronouns for emphasis.

questions.description: The reflexive pronoun is used when the subject and object refer to the same person or thing.

questions.question: The tiger …………………………. was captured last month is now kept in a zoo.

questions.question: I saw a man ………………………….. had lost his arms.
Abraham Lincoln was the best President ………………………… ever ruled America.

questions.question: The man ………………………… they caught was a thief.
